name: My Scary Teacher: Creepy Games
description:
What's your worst nightmare ? going to school & finding your new school teacher is very cruel & scary who punishes the kids in a meanest way possible. You had enough of this, now you have decided to teach her own medicine which is ofcourse bitter. So better get to the school scary teacher is on the round in the school, prank her in the differents ways, go to the class put your bag in the classroom, go to the director's office steal a common pin & go back to your class put it in her chair. However beware of the scary teacher because she is very intelligent by using AI. better be care full of you are going to be his very next victim. Be if she caught you, you are going to end up like the kid in your nightmare hanging upside in her class.


Features of My scary teacher:creepy games

-Multiple levels to scare the teacher
-Highly detailed scary teacher model
-Highly details schoolgirl n school boy characters
-Detailed High school environment which offer many tasks & pranks
-Multilevel scary games in high school
